# DateTimeExtensions.ToDateOnly method

Constructs a DateOnly object that is set to the date part of the specified DateTime.

```csharp
public static DateOnly ToDateOnly(this DateTime dateTime)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| dateTime | The DateTime object to extract the date part from. |

## Return Value

A TimeOnly object representing date of the day specified in the *dateTime* object.
